prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with golden scales and a fierce expression.
I want a bipedal creature that embodies strength and elegance, with metallic accents.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by ancient warriors, adorned with traditional armor.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, showcasing both power and grace.
Imagine a creature that combines the beauty of a dragon with the might of a warrior.
Design a Pokemon with intricate patterns and vibrant colors that stand out in battle.
Show me a majestic Pokemon that balances ferocity with wisdom in its demeanor.
